metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Baldur's MouthAfter Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=89.665054;49.625427;-40.672653&camTarget=89.123558;49.013592;-41.249229ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
0.text: I'll sleep better tonight, knowing these hunks of scrap are off the streets.

1.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
1.text: It's an invasion of our bloody rights, having these things leering over everything we do.

2.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
2.text: Whoever did this, I'd like to shake their hand. Did you hear how patronising those Watchers were? Awful.

3.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
3.text: This is how it starts - Watchers for our 'protection'. Then it's censoring, curfews - and soon we have to ask permission to just exist.
